trans-unit.source: Here you can grant access to one or more news archives.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus dar access ad in u plirs archivs da novitads.

trans-unit.source: Here you can define the news permissions.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus definir las autorisaziun per las novitads.

trans-unit.source: Here you can grant access to one or more news feeds.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti dar access ad in u plirs feeds RSS da novitads

trans-unit.source: Here you can define the news feed permissions.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti definir ils dretgs per feeds RSS.
